Detailed Description

Configuration for built-in memory allocator.

Settings and resources defined here are shared between all database connections.

Example usage:

// Limit storage memory allocations to 1 MiB of 64 byte blocks.
::storage::data::Envinorment::MemoryConfig mem_config(64);
mem_config.add_segment(1024 * 1024);
// Initialize storage library
::storage::data::Environment::init(&mem_config);
